thread.title: Democrat Frontrunner In Trouble As Bernie Sanders Continues To Surge

author: wn.com
title: Democrat Frontrunner In Trouble As Bernie Sanders Continues To Surge
text: Hillary Clinton is seeing her poll numbers slip, with a surge from Bernie Sanders now challenging her position as the Democratic frontrunner. For months Clinton was the presumed winner of the Democratic race, with many assuming she would walk to the nomination. But the Vermont Senator has been steadily building a base of support and...
